high_descs: turn around go straight and turn left to reach the desk.
Pick up the pencil from the table.
go straight and turn left to reach the desklamp.

high_descs: pen is carried near the desklamp table
The desklamp light came on as soon as the pen went to the lighting table.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the desk in your room.
Take the pencil from the table.
Examine a pencil by the light of the desklamp.
